item.title: How to make a CacheVerision file
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

You rename it accordingly, refer to the number being stored in your current CacheVersion variable.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a CacheVerision file
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

So what that does, is it looks in your cache for file named “cacheVersion3.dat” The dat does nothing really, it’s just a file to show what cache version you’re on. When you change the number if the VERSION int, make sure to change the number of the cacheVersion3.dat to the new number, so the client can see that the cache the user just downloaded is the newest version.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a CacheVerision file

item.title: How to make a CacheVerision file
item.dc:creator: @killerjens9 killerjens9
item.description:
@killerjens9 wrote:

private client client; client frame; private final int BUFFER = 1024; /* OPTIONS START HERE *///---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- /* OPTION 1 */private final int VERSION = 1 ; // Version of cache, make it +1 if you updated your cache on your remote server /* OPTION 2 */private final int pauseHandlerDelay = 1000 ; // 1000 = 1 second. This is for when ever the pauseHandler void is called. It just pauses the entire code for the amount of time set. /* OPTION 3*/private String cacheLink = "https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/73757294/LostLegacy/LostLegacyV1.zip" ; // URL of cache on remote server. IE: "www.lostlegacy.netai.net/cachestuff/cacheVersion.txt" /* OPTION 4 */private String cacheDir = "C:/LostLegacyV1/LostLegacyV1" ; // Local link to cache directory - Same as sign.signlink.findcachedir() - Remember trailing '/' /* OPTIONS END HERE *///-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- private String fileToExtract = getCacheDir() + getArchivedName(); public CacheDownloader(client client) { this.client = client; }
and some rows under private int getCacheVersion() { return VERSION; }
same again but here it says someting with .dat i dont understand

Read full topic
